comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: On the left is the Electricity Building. On the right is the Mines and Mining Building. The domed one is the Administration Building. Between the two bridges is Hunter's Island. The photographer is standing on the bridge between Hunter's Island and Wooded Island, in the Lagoon. In this photo from Dream City (1893), the parapet with flags on the Mining Building is visible.
